projects.title: Music Webpage
projects.description: Developed a responsive music Web page using Next.js, Tailwind CSS, and TypeScript, with Aceternity UI for a modern interface.

projects.title: Digital Clock
projects.description: A sleek and modern digital clock application displaying both digital and analog clock interfaces.

projects.title: Gym Webpage
projects.description: A dynamic gym webpage providing information about various workout routines, trainers, and membership plans.

projects.title: Quote Machine
projects.description: A random quote machine that generates and displays motivational quotes to inspire users.

projects.title: Pizza Delivery Application
projects.description: A fully-functional pizza delivery application that allows users to order and track their pizzas.
